aliases.name: test
aliases.command: cls && npm run test:mocha && gittey commit
aliases.description: runs tests and commits if the tests succeed

aliases.name: check
aliases.description: runs tests but does not commit

aliases.name: undo
aliases.description: sets project state to that of the last committed state

aliases.name: docs
aliases.description: sets project state to that of the last committed state

aliases.name: setup
aliases.description: sets the project up to be run
